wikipedia_page.main: Michael Thomas Wright PhD, FREng, FIEE, FIMechE, CMath, FIMA, CIMgt (11 April 1947 – 10 January 2015) was a British academic who was the Vice-Chancellor of Aston University between 1996 and 2006.

response: *  1947   – Michael T. Wright, English engineer and academic (d. 2015)
*Michael T. Wright (born 1948), former curator of mechanical engineering

Michael T. Wright, FSA (Born: 16 June, 1948) was formerly curator of mechanical engineering at the Science Museum and later at Imperial College in London, England. He is known by his analysis of the original fragments of the Antikythera mechanism and by the reconstruction of this Ancient Greek brass mechanism.
